title: Evidence of Nostro Break Review
description: Please provide documentation and evidence of how daily Nostro breaks are reviewed and escalated.

title: Review Evidence for Manual JE Controls
description: Please provide evidence that manual journal entries are reviewed and approved post-booking. Include reviewer details and logs if available.

title: Escalation Evidence for Unresolved Nostro Breaks
description: Please provide documentation showing how unresolved Nostro breaks exceeding 48 hours are escalated and tracked.

title: Code Implementation of Nostro Break Exception Logic
description: Please provide the actual code or logic used to identify and flag daily Nostro breaks exceeding 48 hours. This should include the specific conditional logic implemented, language used (e.g., Python), and a reference to the control ID or location where this logic is maintained.

title: Clarify Control Classification for Break Monitoring
description: Why is Break Monitoring implemented as a detective control instead of a preventive control? Please justify the design choice with appropriate frameworks or design rationale.

title: Provide Evidence of Break Review Execution
description:
Please provide audit-ready evidence that the Nostro break reviews were conducted for the month of April 2025. Include:
	•	Review frequency (e.g., daily, weekly)
	•	Names of reviewers and approvers
	•	Any documented notes or escalations
	•	Reference to logs or approval trails (e.g., .csv, .txt, .md)
